entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
